body:
A little game where you eat smaller cells to become bigger. A good way to pass time.


What is your highest score? Mine is 17,000.


Link: Agar.io
body_tagged:
A little game where you eat smaller cells to become bigger. A good way to pass time.


What is your highest score? Mine is 17,000.


Link: Agar.io
title: Agar.io

replies.body: This game is so cool! Literally everyone in my advisory in school was playing it!
replies.body_tagged: This game is so cool! Literally everyone in my advisory in school was playing it!

replies.body: highest was like 1100 i think. it's pretty hard, but when you're small you can hide in the spiky circles. also don't split (space) unless it gives you the opportunity to eat a somewhat large player, then it's worth it. i've also used it to get away from people that were gonna eat me

replies.body: I just played it, it looks nice. One question though, any idea how do you change your skin?
replies.body_tagged: I just played it, it looks nice. One question though, any idea how do you change your skin?

replies.body: To change the picture? There are a few specific names that give you a skin like mars, doge, earth, and moon.
